everyXMessages.title: Remind every X messages
everyXMessages.help: 0 = disabled; both remind conditions must be true to bot print remind

everyXSeconds.title: Remind every X seconds
everyXSeconds.help: 0 = disabled; both remind conditions must be true to bot print remind

cannotCopyIfInProgress: Cannot copy, if another voting in in progress
cannotCreateIfEmpty: Cannot create new voting without options
cannotCreateNewVoteIfInProgress: Cannot create new voting, if another voting in in progress
